SEARCH
Package photoalbum.gui.controller

Class SearchController

java.lang.Object
photoalbum.gui.controller.SearchController
public class SearchController extends Object
Controller for the search functionality within the photo album application. Allows for searching photos by date range or tags and saving search results as an album.

    • saveResultsAsAlbum

      public void saveResultsAsAlbum(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Saves the current search results as a new album with the given name.
      Parameters:
      e - The action event that triggered the save.

    • updatePhotos

      private void updatePhotos() throws MalformedURLException
      Updates the list of photos displayed in the search results after deduplication.
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - If the photo file paths are not valid URLs.

    • tagSwitch

      public void tagSwitch(javafx.event.ActionEvent e)
      Toggles the search mode between AND and OR for tag-based searches.
      Parameters:
      e - The action event that triggered the toggle.

    • searchByTag

      public void searchByTag() throws MalformedURLException
      Performs a search for photos based on the specified tags.
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - If the photo file paths are not valid URLs.

    • searchByDate

      public void searchByDate() throws MalformedURLException
      Performs a search for photos within a specified date range.
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - If the photo file paths are not valid URLs.

    • initialize

      public void initialize()
      Initializes the controller and sets up the search parameters based on the current user's context.

    • makeHBox

      private javafx.scene.layout.HBox makeHBox(Photo ph)
      Creates an HBox layout containing the photo, caption, and date for display in the search results.
      Parameters:
      ph - The photo to be displayed.
      Returns:
      An HBox containing the photo's details.

    • reloadPhotos

      private void reloadPhotos() throws MalformedURLException
      Reloads the photos to be displayed in the search results.
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - If the photo file paths are not valid URLs.

      Displays an alert dialog with the given title and content.
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the alert.
      content - The content of the alert.
      type - The type of alert to display (e.g., ERROR).
